sqlMap.select: /* MainDAO.selectTotalDocCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_OCR_DOC_MST WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
/* MainDAO.selectTotalRecognitionCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_OCR_DOC_MST WHERE 1=1 AND STAT_CD = '20' AND DEL_YN = 'N'
/* MainDAO.selectTotalLearningCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_OCR_DOC_MST WHERE 1=1 AND STAT_CD IN ('30') AND DEL_YN = 'N'
/* MainDAO.selectTotalEtcCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_OCR_DOC_MST WHERE 1=1 AND STAT_CD NOT IN ('20', '30') AND DEL_YN = 'N'
/* MainDAO.selectTotalDocCountAutoml */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_AUTOML_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N'
/* MainDAO.selectTotalRecognitionCountAutoml */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_AUTOML_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND STAT_CD IN ('11') AND DEL_YN = 'N'
/* MainDAO.selectTotalLearningCountAutoml */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_AUTOML_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND STAT_CD IN ('20') AND DEL_YN = 'N'
/* MainDAO.selectTotalEtcCountAutoml */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_AUTOML_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND STAT_CD IN ('30') AND DEL_YN = 'N'
